name: T-MOBILE USA, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the telecommunications policy including spectrum, competition, rural broadband and security.

Issues related to H.R. 6800, The Health and Economic Recovery Omnibus Emergency Solutions Act (HEROES Act), including broadband connectivity priorities.  Issues related to telecommunications policy including spectrum, 5G, competition, rural broadband, and security.  Issues related to the federal response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Issues related to H.R. 133, Consolidated Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2021, including 5G, broadband connectivity priorities and the COVID Relief Fund.  Issues related to telecommuncations policy including spectrum, 5G, competition, rural broadband, and security.  Issues related to the federal response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Issues related to the Fiscal Year 2022 budget reconciliation process focusing on corporate tax.
